post.author: 고상호
post.content: Current Hot needs: Senior AIX Systems Administrator • • Excellent knowledge of AIX and USS systems software and operations • • Excellent knowledge of Linux. • • Scripting experience. (Korn, Perl, NT, shell) • • Experience with Weblogic, Peoplesoft Internet Architecture, Tivoli • Storage Manager, Remedy, Patrol and Oracle preferred. • • Experience with FAStT, SSA, SCSI, 3494, Fibre-Channel, Clarion, • ESS and RS6000/pSeries technology preferred. • • Experience with various software packages, Microsoft Office, • PeopleSoft preferred • • Ability to work rotating shifts and weekends • • 5+ years related work experience providing 1st level support • • Strong communication, problem solving skills • • Strong documentation skills • • Ability to work within a team oriented environment If any of these jobs appeal to either yourself or somebody that you may know, or even if you would like to just drop us a line, please feel to send your updated resume and/or contact us at info@w5.net.
post.title: Senior AIX Systems Administrator
